== Visual Editor for XML (Vex)
=== What is Vex
Vex is an Open Source plug-in for the http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Eclipse/article.html"> Eclipse
that augments the IDE with a WYSIWYG XML editor. Since August 2008 the plug-in is part of the Eclipse project.
=== Installation You can install Vex via an Eclipse update site:
=== Usage
To switch between the standard Eclipse XML editor and Vex, do a right-click on the file in the Project Explorer and select Visual XML Editor.
image::vex-example.png[]
The plug-in is helpful as a quick preview, but still a work in progress. At the time of writing, embedded text via `XInclude` is just ignored.
